title.text: The bus riders of Seattle: their loves, frustrations — and hopes

chatter.text: A commute, a visit to friends or parents, a lift to school. A Metro bus ride can be taken for many reasons. And the people riding them can be a lot of things, too. Travel with us as we meet the denizens of Seattle’s mass transit. Watch their portraits come alive.

social.text: These bus riders will change the way you think about commuting in Seattle
